title: Mistaken
description: When my father hires Seth Rovero as my bodyguard because of a few bruises on my arms, I’m confident that I can keep my underground fight club a secret.But the devilishly handsome Seth tracks me down way too easily after I ditch him, and he has no problem complying with my club’s most important rule: no entry without a fight.Although I suspect he is here to spy on me rather than to protect me, I may not have a choice but to trust him when a gang leader makes a move to take over my club. As the attraction between us grows, I have no idea if Seth will help me or if he is here for reasons of his own...This is the first installment in the three-book Your Love Is Dangerous series. It may contain potentially triggering situations, violence, strong language, sexual content, and a cliffhanger.
author: Talia Ellison
